name: SLERP
tagline: Learn basic engineering principles in a hands on arduino project
body:
### Welcome to the world of SLERP.
SLERP (Solution Liquidation: Entropy by Rotating Powder) is a fun project. This is a sentence describing how fun it is.

### Support or Contact
Check out the [Wiki](https://github.com/SLERP/slerp-base/wiki)!
